revisions.rev:
{{wiktionary}} '''Jailbreak''' or '''jailbreaking''' may refer to: *A [[prison escape]] *''[['74 Jailbreak]]'', an album by the rock band AC/DC *[[Jailbreak (AC/DC song)|"Jailbreak" (AC/DC song)]], a song by the rock band AC/DC *[[Jailbreak (album)|''Jailbreak'' (album)]], a 1976 album by the rock band Thin Lizzy **[[Jailbreak (Thin Lizzy song)|"Jailbreak" (Thin Lizzy song)]], the title track of the Thin Lizzy album *[[Jailbreak (TV series)|''Jailbreak'' (TV series)]], a reality television series presented by Craig Charles *[[Jailbreak Source]], a computer game modification for the Source Engine *[[privilege escalation|Computer software privilege escalation]], a jargon expression for (the act of) overcoming limitations in a computer system or device that were deliberately placed there for security, administrative, or marketing reasons; also the description and set of technical instructions necessary to achieve a specific jailbreak or a software item designed to achieve a jailbreak. **[[iOS jailbreaking]], overriding the software limitations on the iPhone, iPod Touch, or iPad designed to preclude the use of applications beyond control from the device's manufacturer **[[Rooting (Android OS)|overriding the software limitations]] on [[Android (operating system)|Android]] phones and tablets, **modifying the [[firmware]] in an (outwardly) specially designed computer device to enable its use as the general computer device it represents on the inside, such as the [[Microsoft Xbox]] or [[Sony Playstation]] **breaking out of a [[FreeBSD Jail]] **breaking out of a UNIX/Linux [[chroot jail]] *A variant of [[Tag (game)]]
==See also== *[[Prison Break]], an American TV series
